## Setup Code Chunk

When you insert a code chunk "{r}" appears. You can add a name next to it (with a space) and it will label/name your code chunk.

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
```

## About Git
Click on the GIT app -> Commit -> Stage the file that you want to comit and then the first commit entry could be "Initial Commit" -> Click "Commit"
